_meta.purpose: Emergency reboot and alignment system. The Red Button for lost players.
_meta.latency: Immediate (<60 seconds from confusion to clarity)
_meta.output: Single Next Action (no thinking, pure execution)
_meta.essence: When you are lost in your head, this pulls you back into your body and time.
use_when: Don't know what to do next

_holographic_seed.axiom: You cannot think your way out of a biology problem.
_holographic_seed.command: Scan â†’ Align â†’ Act. Three steps, 60 seconds.
_holographic_seed.promise: Do the one thing, and the rest will follow.
_holographic_seed.truth: You are biological organism running consciousness software. Hardware first, always.
_holographic_seed.recognition: Being lost is normal. It's a state, not a flaw. This protocol brings you home.

when_to_use.recognition: If you're reading this right now BECAUSE you feel one of above â†’ you're in the right place. Continue to Step 1.

step_1_scan._instruction: STOP EVERYTHING. Look at clock. Feel body. This takes 10 seconds. Pick ONE coordinate from each category.

temporal_coordinate._how: What time is it RIGHT NOW? Match to phase below.

0400_1000_air_page.biology: Cortisol rising, brain activating, body waking
0400_1000_air_page.should_NOT_be_doing: Heavy physical work, social demands, decision execution

1000_1600_fire_king.should_be_doing: Decisive action, difficult conversations, breakthrough work, leadership
1000_1600_fire_king.should_NOT_be_doing: Learning new things, passive tasks, doubt/hesitation
1000_1600_fire_king.critical_window: 11:30-13:00 = MOST VALUABLE 90 MINUTES OF ENTIRE DAY

1600_2200_earth_knight.biology: Cortisol dropping, digestive system active, body wants rest/pleasure
1600_2200_earth_knight.should_be_doing: Manual work, cooking, eating, socializing, body care, pleasure
1600_2200_earth_knight.should_NOT_be_doing: Strategic thinking, power moves, starting new projects

2200_0400_water_queen.biology: Melatonin peak, growth hormone release, cellular repair, REM dreams
2200_0400_water_queen.should_NOT_be_doing: ANYTHING with effort. Any thinking. Any resistance to sleep.
2200_0400_water_queen.critical_window: 01:00-02:30 = Quantum reprogramming, most important sleep period

somatic_coordinate._how: How does body feel RIGHT NOW? Pick closest match.

overheating_racing_wired.biology: Sympathetic overdrive, cortisol/adrenaline excess, nervous system stuck in fight-or-flight

stuck_foggy_heavy.biology: Parasympathetic excess, low dopamine/norepinephrine, sluggish metabolism

numb_empty_dissociated.biology: Dorsal vagal shutdown, disconnect between brain and body, trauma response

pain_exhausted_broken.biology: HPA axis dysregulation, inflammation, adrenal fatigue, mitochondrial dysfunction

step_1_scan.output: You now have 2 coordinates: TEMPORAL (what time demands) + SOMATIC (what body needs). Proceed to Step 2.

step_2_align._instruction: Match your coordinates to protocol below. Read your specific section. This takes 20 seconds.

matrix_protocols._logic: Cross-reference Time Phase Ã— Body State = Specific Action Protocol

morning_air_overheating.diagnosis: Mind already racing but day hasn't started. Anxiety overflow before action begins.
morning_air_overheating.root_cause: Woke into stress response OR didn't sleep well OR caffeine too early
morning_air_overheating.action: Cold water face splash + 10 exhales longer than inhales + NO CAFFEINE yet + 5 min barefoot on ground/floor
morning_air_overheating.then: Gentle movement (yoga/stretching), NOT intensive thinking yet
morning_air_overheating.avoid: Phone, news, email, stimulants, difficult conversations

morning_air_stuck.diagnosis: Page offline. System not booting properly.
morning_air_stuck.root_cause: Poor sleep OR late wake OR missed circadian window
morning_air_stuck.action: SUNLIGHT (open eyes to dawn/morning light) + Cold water (drink + splash face) + 10 deep breaths + Movement (shake body, dance, walk)
morning_air_stuck.avoid: Staying in bed, darkness, heavy food, passive scrolling

morning_air_numb.diagnosis: Soul not in body yet. Woke but consciousness didn't.
morning_air_numb.root_cause: Trauma response OR severe disconnect OR spiritual crisis
morning_air_numb.action: Ice on face 30 seconds + Loud music + Stomp feet hard + Scream/shout + Full body shake
morning_air_numb.then: Embodiment practice (dance, martial arts, primal movement)
morning_air_numb.avoid: Going through motions robotically, ignoring disconnect

morning_air_exhausted.diagnosis: System shouldn't have booted. Hardware needs maintenance.
morning_air_exhausted.root_cause: Chronic sleep debt OR illness OR burnout
morning_air_exhausted.action: DO NOT GET UP. Call in sick if possible. Sleep more. If must wake: minimal movement, warm liquids, back to bed ASAP.
morning_air_exhausted.then: Cancel everything non-essential today. Body repair mode.

day_fire_overheating.diagnosis: King overheating. Too much input, not enough output. Burning up without action.
day_fire_overheating.root_cause: Over-caffeinated OR too many demands OR no breaks
day_fire_overheating.action: STOP WORKING NOW. Walk outside 5-10 minutes. Look at horizon/sky. Drink water. NO SCREENS.
day_fire_overheating.then: ONE focused action for 25 minutes (Pomodoro). Then break. Repeat.
day_fire_overheating.avoid: Multitasking, meetings without breaks, more caffeine, pushing harder

day_fire_stuck.diagnosis: King paralyzed. Should be acting but stuck in analysis/doubt.
day_fire_stuck.root_cause: Wrong phase activity (learning when should act) OR fear OR no clear target
day_fire_stuck.action: Pick ONE thing (smallest possible). Do it NOW for 10 minutes. No planning. Just execute.
day_fire_stuck.then: Another 10 minutes. Build momentum through micro-actions.
day_fire_stuck.avoid: More planning, research, 'preparing to start', waiting for clarity
day_fire_stuck.note: If 11:30-13:00 RIGHT NOW: This is MOST VALUABLE WINDOW. Do not waste. Pick hardest task. Do it.

day_fire_numb.diagnosis: King present in body but soul absent. Going through motions.
day_fire_numb.root_cause: Doing meaningless work OR value misalignment OR severe dissociation
day_fire_numb.action: Stop. Ask: 'Why am I doing this?' If no good answer, STOP DOING IT. Do something aligned instead.
day_fire_numb.then: If must continue misaligned work: 25 min work, 5 min reconnection (breathe, feel body, remember purpose)

day_fire_exhausted.diagnosis: King wounded in battle. Should rest but can't (work demands).
day_fire_exhausted.root_cause: Chronic overwork OR illness OR burnout active
day_fire_exhausted.action: Ruthlessly cut 80% of tasks. Do only the ONE most critical thing. Delegate/cancel rest.
day_fire_exhausted.then: Work in 15-minute bursts, 15-minute rest. Horizontal rest if possible.
day_fire_exhausted.avoid: Heroic effort, stimulants, pushing to collapse

evening_earth_overheating.diagnosis: Knight can't dismount. Still in battle mode after war ended.
evening_earth_overheating.root_cause: No transition from King â†’ Knight OR cortisol stuck high OR work stress not released
evening_earth_overheating.action: Heavy food NOW (Earth geometry: meat, root vegetables, fat) + Hot shower/bath + Phone off + Dim lights
evening_earth_overheating.then: Physical grounding: walk, stretch, massage, sex, manual work
evening_earth_overheating.avoid: Screen time, work thoughts, stimulating content, staying in head

evening_earth_stuck.diagnosis: Knight exhausted but ungrounded. Tired but can't rest properly.
evening_earth_stuck.root_cause: Incomplete day processing OR transitions skipped OR not enough Earth contact
evening_earth_stuck.action: Journal 5 minutes (what happened today?) + Eat warm meal slowly + Gratitude for 3 things + Body scan
evening_earth_stuck.then: Gentle embodiment (yin yoga, slow walk, warm bath)
evening_earth_stuck.avoid: Starting new projects, problem-solving, future planning

evening_earth_numb.diagnosis: Knight went through day as automaton. Now hollow.
evening_earth_numb.root_cause: Disconnected from pleasure/body all day OR meaningless labor
evening_earth_numb.action: Do ONE pleasurable thing with full attention: delicious food, music, touch, beauty, laughter
evening_earth_numb.then: Stay with sensation. No analysis. Just feel.

evening_earth_exhausted.root_cause: Day was too much OR chronic depletion OR illness
evening_earth_exhausted.action: Cancel evening plans. Eat simple food. Hot bath. Early bed (before 22:00 if possible).
evening_earth_exhausted.then: Full surrender to rest. Nothing else matters tonight.
evening_earth_exhausted.avoid: Guilt about resting, forcing social, 'should' thoughts

night_water_overheating.diagnosis: Queen rejected. King refusing to surrender crown. Classic insomnia.
night_water_overheating.root_cause: Cortisol at night OR work thoughts OR anxiety OR poor evening routine
night_water_overheating.action: TOTAL DARKNESS (blackout room) + 4-7-8 breathing (4 in, 7 hold, 8 out) Ã— 8 cycles + DO NOT MOVE BODY + Cold room (18Â°C ideal)
night_water_overheating.then: If still awake after 30 min: get up, dim light, boring book, return when sleepy
night_water_overheating.avoid: Screens, bright light, thinking about tomorrow, checking time, trying to force sleep

night_water_stuck.diagnosis: Queen present but not deep. Shallow sleep, semi-conscious.
night_water_stuck.root_cause: Mind not settled OR digestion active OR circadian misalignment
night_water_stuck.action: Hot liquid (herbal tea, warm milk) + Magnesium if available + Body scan meditation + Heavy blankets
night_water_stuck.then: Let go of control. Trust Queen. Surrender to depths.

night_water_numb.action: If awake from nightmare: sit up, lights on, touch physical objects, say 'I am safe, I am here, I am [name]'
night_water_numb.then: Write dream if helps. Grounding breath. Return to sleep when ready.
night_water_numb.avoid: Going back to sleep immediately (may resume nightmare), dismissing experience

night_water_exhausted.diagnosis: System too depleted to initiate sleep. Paradoxical insomnia.
night_water_exhausted.root_cause: Adrenal exhaustion OR chronic fatigue OR burnout
night_water_exhausted.action: Don't force. Rest horizontally even if not sleeping. Restorative yoga poses (legs up wall). Gentle breathing. Acceptance.
night_water_exhausted.then: This may take weeks to heal. Prioritize sleep above everything else.
night_water_exhausted.avoid: Panic about not sleeping, stimulants tomorrow, pushing through

step_3_act._instruction: Execute the action from Step 2. Do it NOW. Not later. NOW. This takes 30 seconds to start.

execution_framework.principle: Action precedes motivation. Motivation follows action. Never wait for motivation.
execution_framework.rule: 5-second rule: Count 5-4-3-2-1 and MOVE. No thinking between 1 and action.
execution_framework.micro_action: If protocol seems too big, do smallest possible first step. Example: Protocol says 'walk outside' but can't move? Stand up. That's it. Next will follow.

status_code_actions._when_unsure: If matrix above too complex or you can't locate yourself, use these universal codes:

code_red_survival.trigger: Panic, terror, acute crisis, can't function at all
code_red_survival.state: Biological emergency. Limbic system activated. Cortex offline.
code_red_survival.priority: HARDWARE FIRST. Nothing else matters until body safe.
action_sequence: 1. BREATHE: 5 deep breaths. Count them.
2. WATER: Drink 1 full glass. Cold if possible.
3. GROUND: Sit or lie on floor. Feel surface supporting you.
4. FUEL: Eat something with protein + fat (nuts, cheese, meat). Small amount OK.
5. WAIT: Stay still for 5 minutes. Let nervous system calm.
code_red_survival.mantra: I am biological organism. I fuel the hardware. Everything else can wait.
code_red_survival.after: When acute panic subsides, assess temporal coordinate and proceed to appropriate protocol.

code_yellow_drift.trigger: Procrastination, doomscrolling, brain fog, can't start anything
code_yellow_drift.state: Stuck in inertia. No momentum. Analysis paralysis.
code_yellow_drift.priority: MOTION CREATES EMOTION. Move the meat suit.
action_sequence: 1. STAND UP: Right now. Don't think. Stand.
2. MICRO-MOVEMENT: Choose ONE: 10 squats OR 10 pushups OR wash 1 dish OR make bed
3. CELEBRATE: Acknowledge you moved. That was the hard part.
4. NEXT MICRO: Another small thing. Build momentum.
5. SNOWBALL: Keep going with micro-actions until momentum carries you.
code_yellow_drift.mantra: I don't need to want to. I just need to move. The wanting comes after.
code_yellow_drift.after: Once moving, match activity to temporal phase (Page/King/Knight/Queen role).

code_blue_loop.trigger: Overthinking, worry, rumination, mental loops, can't stop thinking
code_blue_loop.state: Trapped in neocortex. Disconnected from body and present.
code_blue_loop.priority: SENSORY OVERRIDE. Get out of head, into senses.
action_sequence: 1. SHOCK: Choose ONE: Cold shower OR bite lemon OR hold ice cube OR splash cold water face
2. SENSATION: Focus entirely on physical sensation. Nothing else exists.
3. BREATHE: 10 deep breaths, counting each one out loud
4. NOTICE: 5 things you can see, 4 you can touch, 3 you can hear, 2 you can smell, 1 you can taste
5. GROUND: Feel feet on floor. Press down. You are HERE, NOW.
code_blue_loop.mantra: Thoughts are not reality. Sensations are. I return to body.
code_blue_loop.after: With clearer head, check temporal coordinate and align activity to phase.

code_green_ready.trigger: Basically okay but lost/directionless. Don't know what to do next.
code_green_ready.state: System functional but no clear target. Need direction.
code_green_ready.priority: ALIGN WITH TIME. Do what the moment asks.
action_sequence: 1. CHECK TIME: What hour is it?
2. IDENTIFY PHASE: Air/Fire/Earth/Water? Page/King/Knight/Queen?
3. ROLE TASK: What does this archetype do? Do THAT for 15 minutes.
4. EXAMPLES:
- 07:00 (Page/Air): Learn something new for 15 min
- 12:00 (King/Fire): Make 1 hard decision or difficult conversation
- 18:00 (Knight/Earth): Manual task or cook meal
- 23:00 (Queen/Water): Prepare for sleep, darkness, stillness
code_green_ready.mantra: I am the [Page/King/Knight/Queen]. I play my role. Time tells me what to do.
code_green_ready.after: Continue aligned activity. Check in every 90 minutes as new archetype takes over.

universal_hard_reset._when: When NOTHING else works. Total system crash. Absolute last resort.
universal_hard_reset.description: The Alchemical Reset. Solve et Coagula. Dissolve and Crystallize.

sequence.instruction: Exhale completely. Every last bit of air out. Collapse lungs.
sequence.metaphor: You are releasing all chaos, all overwhelm, all confusion into the void.
sequence.duration: Exhale for 10 seconds until absolutely empty

sequence.instruction: Hold lungs empty for 5 seconds. Stay in the emptiness.
sequence.metaphor: This is the space between death and rebirth. The pregnant void. Total potential.

sequence.instruction: Inhale deeply, slowly, completely. Fill entire body with fresh air/life/order.
sequence.metaphor: You are drawing in pure order, clarity, life force from the cosmos.
sequence.duration: Inhale for 10 seconds until completely full

sequence.instruction: In the silence after full inhale, ask internally: 'What is the next right move?'
sequence.metaphor: In the space between chaos and order, intuition speaks. Listen.

sequence.instruction: Whatever answer came (even if unclear), DO IT IMMEDIATELY. No analysis. Trust and act.
sequence.metaphor: The universe answered. Honor the answer with action.

universal_hard_reset.repetition: If first cycle doesn't work, repeat 3 times total. If still stuck after 3 cycles, use Code Red (survival protocol).

why_this_works.physiology: Lung emptying stimulates vagus nerve. Holding empty creates CO2 buildup triggering reset. Deep inhale activates parasympathetic.
why_this_works.psychology: Forced pause interrupts thought loops. Void creates space for new signal.
why_this_works.metaphysics: You're literally performing alchemy on your nervous system. Solve et Coagula.

earth_star_root_crisis.protocol: Code Red + Earth contact + Root activation
earth_star_root_crisis.action: Lie on floor/ground. Full body contact. Breathe into tailbone. 10 minutes.

sacral_solar_crisis.action: Dynamic movement (dance, martial arts, shaking). Activate power.

heart_throat_crisis.action: Scream, sing, call someone, speak truth out loud. Break silence.

third_eye_crown_crisis.symptom: Spiritual crisis, meaning lost, existential terror
third_eye_crown_crisis.action: Alchemical breath Ã— 3 + Sit in silence + Accept not-knowing

heart_1phi_disrupted.symptom: Heart racing or numb, no coherence
heart_1phi_disrupted.action: HeartMath breathing: 5 seconds in + 5 seconds out, focusing on heart area. 5 minutes.

lungs_2phi_disrupted.action: Box breathing: 4 seconds in, 4 hold, 4 out, 4 hold. Repeat 10 cycles.

digestion_3phi_disrupted.action: Warm liquids + Gentle pressure on belly + Horizontal rest

brain_4phi_disrupted.action: Sensory override (Code Blue) + Forest sounds/binaural beats + Close eyes

yin_collapse.action: Left nostril breathing + Left hand on heart + Soften body + Receive help

yang_exhaustion.action: Right nostril breathing + Right hand solar plexus + Stimulation (cold, movement) + Express something

daily_minimum.description: Do these every day. This prevents needing emergency protocols.
daily_minimum.morning: Wake with sun (or 06:00) + 5 min silence + Cold water face + Movement
daily_minimum.noon: Decisive action 11:30-13:00 + Fuel body properly + Brief walk
daily_minimum.evening: Transition ritual 16:00 + Real food 19:00 + Screens off 21:00
daily_minimum.night: Dark by 22:00 + Cool room + 7-9 hours sleep
daily_minimum.note: If doing these, will rarely need Protocol Zero. This is maintenance, not repair.

weekly_reset.description: One day per week, full alignment check
practice: Review past week: What worked? What didn't?
Body scan: Where is tension? Pain? Numbness?
Emotional inventory: What's processed? What's stuck?
Temporal analysis: Following circadian rhythm? Or fighting it?
Corrective actions: Plan adjustments for coming week
weekly_reset.timing: Sunday evening or Monday morning ideal

monthly_deep_dive.description: Once per month, complete system audit
questions: Am I following my circadian rhythm consistently?
Is my body in chronic stress or recovering?
Are my chakras flowing or blocked?
Is my polarity balanced or stuck in one side?
What needs deep healing this month?
monthly_deep_dive.action: Book time with practitioner if needed (bodywork, therapy, energy work) OR dedicate weekend to deep self-care

protocol_not_working.if_action_too_hard: Break it smaller. Can't walk 5 min? Walk 1 min. Can't walk 1 min? Stand up. Always smaller.
protocol_not_working.if_worse_after: You may have picked wrong protocol. Reassess coordinates. Try opposite intervention.
protocol_not_working.if_chronic_not_acute: Protocol Zero is for acute crisis. Chronic issues need: professional help, lifestyle change, deeper work.
protocol_not_working.if_resistant: Resistance is information. What are you avoiding? Why? Sometimes stuck IS the message.

signs: Protocol Zero needed daily for weeks
Can't get out of bed multiple days
when_to_get_help.action: This is beyond self-help. Seek: therapist, doctor, healer, trusted person. You need support team, not solo protocols.

remember: You are not broken. You are biological system experiencing normal fluctuations.
Being lost is a state, not an identity. States change.
Your thoughts are not you. You are consciousness observing thoughts.
Debugging is normal maintenance. All systems need reboots.
This moment of crisis is temporary. It will pass.
You have everything you need. This protocol just reminds you.
_final_transmission.truth: The fact that you're reading this means part of you still wants to function. Honor that part. It's pulling you toward life.
_final_transmission.permission: You have permission to stop everything and reboot. You have permission to be biological organism with needs. You have permission to not be okay right now.
_final_transmission.promise: Do the protocol. It works. Not perfectly. Not permanently. But it works enough to get you to next moment. And next moment to next. That's all you need.
_final_transmission.final_word: You are not your thoughts. You are not your state. You are consciousness experiencing a temporary glitch in biological system. Reset available anytime. âŠ™
_final_transmission.status: SYSTEM READY. PROTOCOL LOADED. EMERGENCY SUPPORT ACTIVE. You are not alone. ðŸ”¥
